Las Nubes | 5885 Old Dixie Highway, Forest Park 30297


Saturday, September 4, Steppin N Black, White & Green

Marriott Atlanta Airport Gateway | 2020 Convention Ctr Concourse, Atlanta




Doing It Again In 2K10
LDW: Destination: Atlanta
Home of the Black & White Steppers Ball hosted by Sarah Teagle
11-Year Anniversary | Sept 2 - Sept 6

11th Annual Black & White Steppers Ball

September 2 - 6 | Get Your Step On!
Marriott Atlanta Gateway Hotel | 403 Rooms

2020 Convention Center Concourse

Atlanta, GA 30350 | 404.763.1544 | $92pn

Toll Free: 800.228.9290 | Code: ATLMA | Group Code: SPPSPPA


WEEKEND EVENTS

Thursday, September 2, Steppin in 70s Attire | A Benefit Set Featuring a $1,000 Walkin Contest

Mr. V's Figure 8 | 3131 Campbellton Road SW, Atlanta 30337 | 678-698-2661 $5.00


Friday, September 3, Steppin N2 The Harlem Renaissance Era

Las Nubes | 5885 Old Dixie Highway, Forest Park 30297 $25


Saturday, September 4, Steppin N Black, White & Green

Marriott Atlanta Airport Gateway | 2020 Convention Ctr Concourse, Atlanta $35


Sunday, September 5, Steppin N Classy White w/Class Act Steppers

Marriott Atlanta Airport Gateway | 2020 Convention Ctr Concourse, Atlanta $25

Monday, September 6, Jeans & Green, Backstage $10

Tuesday, September 7, Set w/Smooth Silhouettes @ Quarters

Wednesday, September 1 & 8, Set w/TSWGA @ SouthBeach

WEEKEND pkg $65
Weekend Package (Fri, Sat & Sun only) | $65 (expires July 31) | $85 After Reserved Tables, $100 per night, per table | Reserved Seats $10 per night, per chair 1st Come,
PLEASE NOTE PRICE INCREASE EFFECTIVE AUG 1

Thur, $5 ATD (not included in package)

Fri, $25 Advance, $30 @ Venue Box Office, if available

Sat, $35 Advance, $45 @ Venue Box Office, if available

Sun, $25 Advance, $30 @ Venue Box Office, if available

Mon, $10 Advance, $15 ATD (not included in package)

Other Sets: Tue 2 Item Minimum | Wed, $5 ATD
Ticket Purchases at our Online Box Office or by certified check or money

money.* Tickets are available for pickup onsite of venue or in hospitality

suite. Add $20 shipping fee for mailed tickets. It is highly recommended

you do not wait to purchase tickets at the venue:

Certified funds should be mailed to: Sarah Teagle c/o The Steppers Club, PO Box 223, Avondale Estates, GA 30002 | To pay by phone or for questions, call 404.931.1367




1st Served | Workshops, $20 Each



Advancin The Dance Workshops
$20 per workshop | Host Hotel

12:00-2:00p Steppin N2 Ballroom Workshop

w/Purple Charlotte Steppers

Some Steppers from Boston will be going.. Will You?
